data.actual_result: You only see cookies and no additional text
data.expected_result: You see 200 cookies and the message after it.
data.short_description: Too many emojis make text disappear (Not a char count issue)
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a message with 200 \`:cookie:\` directly after each other (No spaces) - Write some text after those cookies. - Send message (No warning that one exceeds the character limit). at this point the message should be just over 1600 characters long, well below the limit. - Additional test: edit message and remove 2 \`:cookie:\` instances, save, now the text will be displayed. - pastebins with examples: https://pastebin.com/6cXCTxs8 and https://pastebin.com/wnamBGcE
